channel.title: 'Yo Mamma' Jokes
channel.description:
Post them ;) Nothing really offensive though.
* Yo mama's house is so dusty the roaches ride around on dune buggys * Yo mama's missing a finger and can't count past 9 * Yo mama's so clumsy she got tangled up in a cordless phone * Yo mama's glasses are so thick she can see into the future * Yo mama's so stupid she stole free bread * Yo mama's so stupid she lies on the tv and watches the couch * Yo mama so fat at the zoo the elephants started throwing her peanuts! * Yo mama's so fat when her beeper goes off people think she's backing up * Yo mama so stupid she took a ruler to bed to see how long she slept. * Yo mama so ugly she make onions cry. * Yo mama so ugly I put her picture on my fridge 'cause I was on a diet. * Yo mama so ugly the doctor took one look at her at birth and slapped the mother. * Yo mama so fat she goes to a movie and she sits next to everybody. * Yo mama so old when she saw Jurassic park it brought back memories * Yo mama so fat she uses a pillow case as a sock. * Yo mama so fat they have to grease the bath tub to get her out * Yo mama so poor she can't afford to pay attention * Yo mama so poor she does drive by shootings on the bus. * Yo mama so stupid she needs a receipe to make ice cubes. * Yo mama so stupid she sold her car for gasoline money * Yo mama so stupid she could trip over a cordless phone * Yo mama so ugly when she joined an ugly contest, they said 'Sorry, no professionals.' * Yo mama so ugly she scares the cockroaches away. * Yo mama so ugly that your father takes her to work with him so that he doesn't have to kiss her goodbye. * Yo mama so dumb, she failed a blood test. * Yo mama so dumb, I asked her to buy a color tv and she asked which color? * Yo mama is so poor she ran after a garbage truck with a shopping list in her hand. * Yo mama so stupid she bought a solar-powered flashlight * Yo mama's so hairy, she got a trim and lost 10 pounds. * Yo mama so stupid she tried to drown a fish in water * Yo mama so stupid she returned a donut 'cause it had a hole in it * Yo mama so short she does backflips under the bed. * Yo mama so short you can see her feet on her drivers licence! * Yo mama so lazy she thinks a two-income family is where yo daddy has two jobs. * Yo mama's glasses are so thick that when she looks on a map she can seen people waving. * Yo mama has one leg and a bicycle. * Yo mama has so much hair on her upper lip, she braids it. * Yo mama is missing a finger and can't count past 9. * Yo mama so fat even Bill Gates couldn't pay for her liposuction! * Yo mama so fat they use the elastic in her underwear for bungee jumping. * Yo mama so fat that she cant tie her own shoes. * Your Mama's so fat, that when she left the country the population dropped by 10 percent
http://www.messengertools.net/yo-mama-jokes-1.html For Those above :)

programming, irc, cars
